timeline.message:
Fix ClientReliableTopicOnClusterRestartTest

The reasoning is the same as in https://github.com/hazelcast/hazelcast/pull/16644.
Introducing Thread.sleep to ensure that a read operation comes in before
a message publish operation is brittle. A large enough pause can reorder
the operations, causing the test to hang. Sleeping for too long can
cause the test duration to go up too high. Instead, we rewrite the test.

Fixes: https://github.com/hazelcast/hazelcast/issues/17015

timeline.bodyText: Can we get rid of INVOCATION_TIMEOUT_SECONDS also? It does not seem to have any value anymore.
